div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1015 Olbia (mod. Parutino), Ochakov (751) raion, Nikolaev oblast, Ukraine, 1907 Burial: mid 4th cent. B.C. Contents: 278 AE Olbia: AE. (as AMNG I.1, pl. 9, 10-11 [249] unc. [29]) Disposition: Leningrad (merged with main collection) Golubtsov, IAK 51 (1914), pp. 90-3
